channel.title: Source SDK 2007 Download problems
channel.description:
I download the game, and when i click to play, the download window of the source sdk 2007 appears, the problem is that when i try to download it, steam close up without tell me a error or something.
I scan the computer for virures with avira, i reinstall steam, and the game, i restar the computer a nothing... somebody can help me because i really want to play :c

item.title: Source SDK 2007 Download problems
item.dc:creator: FERGUS
item.description:
spywriter:

OOOO-Kaaaaaayyyyyyy. . .
Tools section?
Library?

Pleeease, somebody, tell me how to “download and install” Source SDK 2007!:’(

In steam you have your library menu. Change section from “All games” to “tools”.

Read full topic

item.title: Source SDK 2007 Download problems
item.dc:creator: spywriter
item.description:
d9001:

Maybe try downloading Source SDK Base 2007 manually from under the “Tools” section of the Library?

OOOO-Kaaaaaayyyyyyy. . .
Tools section?
Library?

Pleeease, somebody, tell me how to “download and install” Source SDK 2007!:’(

Read full topic

item.title: Source SDK 2007 Download problems
item.dc:creator: Zitlotto
item.description:
Can you download other games normally? or is it only With source SDK? If it’s with everything try reinstalling steam and cleaning your registry with Ccleaner or similar

Read full topic

item.title: Source SDK 2007 Download problems
item.dc:creator: d9001
item.description:
Maybe try downloading Source SDK Base 2007 manually from under the “Tools” section of the Library?
